title: 능력과 계획 대화 듣기
description: 조동사를 사용한 능력, 계획, 조언에 대한 대화를 듣고 이해합니다.

audio.text: Hi, I'm Alex. [PAUSE] I can speak four languages: English, Spanish, French, and Korean. [PAUSE] When I was younger, I could only speak English. But I've always loved learning languages. [PAUSE] Next month, I will start learning Japanese. I'm so excited! [PAUSE] My teacher says I should practice speaking every day. She also said I must study grammar regularly. [PAUSE] I think everyone should try learning a new language. It may be difficult at first, but it's really rewarding. [PAUSE] You can make friends from all over the world!

targetSentences: My teacher says I should practice speaking every day.

questions.question: How many languages can Alex speak?
questions.explanation: Alex는 4개 언어(영어, 스페인어, 프랑스어, 한국어)를 말할 수 있습니다.

questions.question: Which language is Alex NOT currently able to speak?
questions.explanation: Alex는 일본어는 다음 달에 배우기 시작할 예정이므로 아직 말할 수 없습니다.

questions.question: Alex could speak four languages when he was younger.
questions.explanation: 어렸을 때 Alex는 영어만 말할 수 있었습니다. (I could only speak English)

questions.question: What will Alex start learning next month?
questions.explanation: Alex는 다음 달에 일본어 배우기를 시작할 것입니다.

questions.question: What does Alex's teacher say he should do?
questions.explanation: 선생님은 Alex가 매일 말하기를 연습해야 한다고 말했습니다.

questions.question: What does Alex say he must do?
questions.explanation: 선생님은 Alex가 정기적으로 문법을 공부해야 한다고 말했습니다.

questions.question: Alex thinks learning a language may be difficult at first.
questions.explanation: Alex는 언어 배우기가 처음에는 어려울 수 있다고 생각합니다. (It may be difficult at first)

questions.question: Alex believes everyone should try learning a new language.
questions.explanation: Alex는 모든 사람이 새로운 언어를 배워보아야 한다고 생각합니다.

questions.question: According to Alex, what can you do by learning languages?
questions.explanation: 언어를 배우면 전 세계의 친구들을 사귈 수 있습니다.
